sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav class="nav">
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 1}" @click="changeTab(1)">All</button>
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 2}" @click="changeTab(2)">Active</button>
    <button class="nav__link" :class="{active: activeTab === 3}" @click="changeTab(3)">Completed</button>
  </nav>
  <TodoInput class="todo__form"/>
  <TodoList v-if="activeTab === 1" :todos="allTodos"/>
  <TodoList v-if="activeTab === 2" :todos="activeTodos"/>
  <TodoList v-if="activeTab === 3" :todos="completedTodos"/>
</template>
<script>
  import { useStore } from 'vuex';
  import TodoInput from './components/TodoInput.vue';
  import TodoList from './components/TodoList.vue';

  export default {
    components: { TodoInput, TodoList },
    setup() {
      let activeTab = 1
      const store = useStore()
      let allTodos = store.state.todoList
      let activeTodos = store.getters.activeTodos
      let completedTodos = store.getters.completedTodos

      const changeTab = (id) => {
        activeTab = id
      }

      return { activeTab, allTodos, activeTodos, completedTodos, changeTab }
    }
  }
</script>
<style scoped>
  .todo__form {
    margin-bottom: 50px;
  }
  .
</style>
